articles.title: Chinese Communist Party Purge Begins over Coronavirus
articles.description: Beijing has begun sacking local officials in Hubei province over the coronavirus outbreak, including two Communist Party officials who left a teenager with cerebral palsy without care for six days while his family was placed in quarantine. The teenager died a…

articles.author: Frances Martel
articles.title: ‘What’s Wrong with You?’: Taiwan Excoriates WHO for Coronavirus ‘Fake News’
articles.description: Foreign Affairs Minister Joseph Wu of Taiwan erupted against the World Health Organization (WHO) on Twitter Wednesday for its deliberate exclusion of the country from the ongoing coronavirus response and its misreporting on the situation in Taiwan.
articles.content:
Foreign Affairs Minister Joseph Wu of Taiwan erupted against the World Health Organization (WHO) on Twitter Wednesday for its deliberate exclusion of the country from the ongoing coronavirus response and its misreporting on the situation in Taiwan.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Tokyo tries to Quell Fear of Olympic-Paralympic Cancellation
articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — Tokyo Olympic and Paralympic organizers again tried on Thursday to allay fears that the 2020 Games could be postponed or canceled by the fast-spreading virus from China.
articles.content:
TOKYO (AP) Tokyo Olympic and Paralympic organizers again tried on Thursday to allay fears that the 2020 Games could be postponed or canceled by the fast-spreading virus from China.

articles.title: Coronavirus Death Toll Breaks Record Again with 73 Dead in One Day

articles.author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
articles.title: Vatican Sends ‘Hundreds of Thousands’ of Medical Masks to China
articles.description: The Vatican announced it sent hundreds of thousands of medical masks to China this week to help forestall the spread of the coronavirus.
articles.content:
ROME The Vatican announced it sent hundreds of thousands of medical masks to China this week to help forestall the spread of the coronavirus.
Vatican News reported that the masks were sent to the regions most affected by the virus, namely Hubei, Zhejiang, an… [+963 chars]
